original_text: Demetrius is well spoken of by everyone—and even by the truth itself. We also speak well of him, and you know that our testimony is true.
korean_text: 데메드리오는 뭇 사람에게도, 진리에게서도 증거를 받았으매 우리도 증언하노니 너는 우리의 증언이 참된 줄을 아느니라

sentences.original_text: Demetrius is well spoken of by everyone
sentences.korean_translation: 데메드리오는 모든 사람에게 잘 칭찬을 받고 있으며

sentences.original_text: and even by the truth itself
We also speak well of him
and you know that our testimony is true
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 우리의 증언이 참된 것임을 압니다
